author: ESPNcricinfo staff
title: £1 million domestic prize money reallocated to support player wages
description: Two-month salary reduction for county players also agreed, and furloughing if requested. | ESPNcricinfo.com
content: The Professional Cricketers' Association (PCA) has agreed to reallocate £1 million of domestic prize money towards player contracts for 2020, after reaching an agreement with the ECB and the 18 first-class counties in response to the COVID-19 outbreak that ha… [+2104 chars]
